text:
On 24 February 448,962 1st doses💉 were administered across the UK🇬🇧
 
📈37% day on day rate increase 
📉7% week on week rate decrease
📉7-day average of 324,108 (down from 328,843)

Slowly recovering to levels expected based on historical weekly patterns
